traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The marid can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the marid dies, its body disintegrates into a burst of water and foam, leaving behind only equipment the marid was wearing or carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The marid makes two trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6 damage) piercing damage, or 15 (2d8 + 6 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Water Jet
entries: The marid magically shoots water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 21 (6d6 damage) bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 20 feet away from the marid and knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a target takes half the bludgeoning damage, but is neither pushed nor knocked {@condition prone}.
